question.text: How long does it usually take for a deposit to be processed?
variations: When will my deposit be processed?
How long until my deposit shows up?

answer.short: Deposits are typically processed within 5 to 10 minutes.
answer.detailed: Generally speaking, the deposit processing takes about 5 to 30 minutes.If you have not arrived for more than 30 minutes, you can contact our online customer service at any time, and we will immediately check the situation.

followUpQuestions: What if my deposit hasn't arrived after 30 minutes?

question.text: Where can I find the download link for the game?
variations: How do I download the game?

answer.short: Click the portrait icon in lower right corner and scroll to bottom for download link.
answer.detailed: To find the download link, you only need to click the portrait icon in the lower right corner, and then pull the page to the recommended link part at the bottom, and you can see the download link!

question.text: How do I change the language settings in the app?
variations: Can I change the app language?

answer.short: Click portrait icon in lower right corner, select Language, choose preferred language, and confirm.
answer.detailed: To change the language settings, click the portrait icon in the lower right corner of the app, then click on Language. Select your preferred language from the available options, and press confirm to save your selection.

question.text: How can I update my contact information?

answer.short: Click portrait icon, select update phone number, enter new number, verify with TAC code.
answer.detailed: If your contact information has changed, you can update it by: 1. Opening the app and tapping the profile icon in the bottom right corner, and 2. Updating your personal details, such as your email address or phone number. Make sure all information is accurate before saving.

followUpQuestions: What if I don't receive the TAC code?
Can I update multiple contact details?

question.text: Why do I keep losing at the slot machines?
variations: Why am I not winning on slots?

answer.short: Slot machines involve both winning and losing; outcomes are based on chance and luck.
answer.detailed: The odds of winning in slot games are determined by the game’s random mechanics. It’s normal to experience ups and downs, as every spin is an independent random event. Don’t worry if it feels like winning is harder at times—it’s just part of the game’s natural variance. Each game has a preset return-to-player (RTP) rate, so you always have a chance to hit big wins. Focus on enjoying the game, and try out different slots to discover more fun and opportunities!

followUpQuestions: How do slot machines work?
Are there strategies for playing slots?

question.text: What happens if I enter the wrong reference number on my deposit receipt?

answer.short: Your funds are safe but processing may be delayed. Please be more careful next time.
answer.detailed: If you enter the wrong reference number, please remember to be more careful next time. Enter your reference number correctly when you make a transfer. This may slightly delay the processing time, but your funds are safe.

followUpQuestions: How can I correct a wrong reference number?
Will this affect future deposits?

question.text: Why is the payment processing slower than usual tonight?

answer.short: Due to high player activity, processing may be delayed 5-30 minutes.
answer.detailed: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience! Payment processing is slower than usual tonight due to a high volume of users making transactions simultaneously, causing slight delays in the system. We are working hard to ensure all transactions are processed as quickly as possible, typically within 5 to 30 minutes. If the wait is too long, please let me know, and I’ll do my best to assist you!

followUpQuestions: When will processing times return to normal?
Should I wait to make my transaction?

question.text: Why hasn't my withdrawal request been approved yet?

answer.short: Due to high volume, withdrawals may take 5-30 minutes to process.
answer.detailed: I understand your concern, and I apologize for any inconvenience caused! Typically, once a withdrawal is approved, the funds should arrive in your account within 5 to 30 minutes. If it takes longer, please check your bank account's transaction history. If it still doesn’t show up, kindly provide a screenshot of the transaction, and I will promptly investigate the issue to ensure it gets resolved!

followUpQuestions: How can I check my withdrawal status?
What if it takes longer than 30 minutes?

question.text: What should I do if I can't take a screenshot of my bank app for deposit?

answer.short: Log in to your bank app again, access transfer history, and take screenshots of the transaction record.
answer.detailed: If you cannot capture screenshots in the bank application, it is recommended that you log in to your bank application again, access historical transfer records, find the corresponding transaction, and take screenshots of the document.

followUpQuestions: What if I can't access my bank history?
Are there alternative ways to verify my deposit?

question.text: How long does it usually take for a deposit to be credited to my account?
variations: When will my deposit show up?

answer.short: Deposits typically take 5 to 30 minutes to be credited after review.
answer.detailed: Usually, the deposit update will take 5 to 30 minutes. Our customer service team will review your deposit during this period. After the review is completed, the funds will be automatically updated to your account.

followUpQuestions: What if my deposit takes longer than 30 minutes?
How can I check my deposit status?

question.text: Do you have any loyalty programs or VIP benefits for regular players?

answer.short: Yes, we offer VIP benefits and point rewards for regular players.
answer.detailed: Yes, we provide a variety of VIP benefits for regular players. You can accumulate points for each bet, which can be redeemed for various rewards. To check your points and available rewards, click on the portrait icon in the lower right corner of the application interface, then select VIP benefits.

question.text: Can I make a small transfer to verify if my account is working properly?

question.text: What should I do if my fast payment recharge is not showing in my account?

answer.short: Take a screenshot of your bank transfer record and send it to us for verification.

question.text: How can I follow up on a withdrawal request that hasn't been approved yet?

answer.short: Check transaction records in the app or contact customer service for status.
answer.detailed: To follow up on a withdrawal request that has not been approved, you can check the following steps: 1. Log in to your account and enter the transaction records in the app. Here you can check the status of all withdrawal requests. 2. If the withdrawal request is not approved, please contact online customer service. We will check and provide further assistance. Generally, the withdrawal processing time is 5 to 30 minutes, but under special circumstances, there may be delays.

followUpQuestions: What could cause withdrawal delays?
How do I contact customer service?

question.text: What should I do if I get disconnected during a game?

answer.short: Reconnect to network, log in again, and your game progress will be restored.
answer.detailed: If you get disconnected during a game, follow these steps: 1. Try to reconnect to the network to ensure your network connection is stable. 2. Log in to the game again. In most cases, the system will automatically restore your game progress. 3. If the problem persists, contact online customer service. We will check and ensure your gaming experience will not be affected.

followUpQuestions: Will I lose my game progress?
How do I contact customer service?

question.text: Why do I have to wait 5 minutes between transactions?

answer.short: The 5-minute wait is a security measure to prevent frequent trading and protect your account.
answer.detailed: The system requires you to wait for 5 minutes between transactions, usually because you have conducted many identical or similar transactions in a short period of time. To ensure the security of the account and prevent any potential abnormal operation, the system temporarily restricts frequent trading requests.

followUpQuestions: Can this waiting time be reduced?
What counts as too many transactions?

question.text: What should I do if I suspect my account has been hacked?

answer.short: Change your password immediately and contact customer support with details of suspicious activity.
answer.detailed: If you suspect your account has been hacked, take these steps immediately: 1. Change your password. 2. Contact our customer support team right away with details of any suspicious activity. 3. Check your recent transaction history for any unauthorized actions. We'll investigate and take necessary measures to secure your account.

followUpQuestions: How do I enable two-factor authentication?

question.text: Are there any bonuses for referring friends to the platform?

answer.short: Yes, receive a bonus when referred friends sign up and make their first deposit.
answer.detailed: Sure! You’ll earn a 3% commission on the total 4D bets placed by any new members you refer. On top of that, you’ll also collect extra VIP points—the more referrals you make, the more you can earn! For full details, check out the VIP Rewards section in the app.

question.text: How do I participate in the VIP loyalty program?

answer.short: You can simply start playing games to automatically earn points and increase VIP level for better rewards.

These points can be redeemed for various rewards in the VIP benefits section. The more you play, the higher your VIP level and the better the rewards!
